positive_examples: This is an example of software designing.
The software designing demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed software designing in this context.
A typical case of software designing would involve these features.
The concept of software designing applies here.
The process of creating the architecture, interfaces, and specifications for software systems and applications.
negative_examples: This is an example of graphic designing, not software designing.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: GraphicDesigning, or other types of Designing

definition: The process of planning and specifying the architecture and components of software systems.
